titles: A seasonable discourse wherein sincerity & delight in the service of God is earnestly pressed upon professors of religion delivered on a publick fast at Cambridge in New-England, by the reverend and learned Urian Oakes, late pastor of the church there, and president of Harvard Colledge.
author: Oakes, Urian, 1631-1681.
notes: Imperfect: print showthrough with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
